Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இளைதாக முள்மரம் கொல்க களையுநர் கைகொல்லும் காழ்த்த இடத்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A thorny tree should be felled while young, (for) when it is grown it will destroy the hand of the feller.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split image. On the left, a small, young, thorny sapling ('இளைதாக முள்மரம்') is growing. A wise person is shown easily uprooting and destroying it ('கொல்க').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, the same person has waited. The sapling has now grown into a massive, monstrous, impenetrable tree of thorns ('காழ்த்த இடத்து').
Layered_Composition.Background: The person is now trying to cut down the giant thorny tree, but the thorns are so large and sharp that they are wounding and destroying the person's own hands ('கைகொல்லும்'). They have waited too long, and the threat is now too powerful to handle.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Destroy a thorny problem (or enemy) while it is still young and weak. If you wait until it is mature and strong, it will destroy you when you try to deal with it.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The small, manageable sapling versus the giant, dangerous thorny tree is the central visual contrast.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Cautionary, a lesson in proactive problem-solving, dangerous growth.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left side is in clear, manageable daylight. The right side is dark and ominous, with the giant thorny tree casting menacing shadows.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A side-by-side composition that clearly shows the 'before' (easy) and 'after' (impossible) stages of dealing with the threat.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a focus on the texture of the thorns.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast lighting to differentiate the two scenarios.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Dark fantasy, with a strong moral.

Cultural_Anchors: Destroy a thorny tree while it is young ('இளைதாக முள்மரம் கொல்க')
When it is mature, it will kill the hand ('கைகொல்லும் காழ்த்த இடத்து')
